title.value: UK Core NHS Number Verification Status Wales

description.value: A CodeSystem for Wales that identifies the trace status of an NHS Number with respect to a national source of NHS Numbers. These codes and their descriptions represent concepts used in Wales and are copied from the content of the [NHS Wales Data Dictionary NHS Number Status Indicator](https://www.datadictionary.wales.nhs.uk/#!WordDocuments/nhsnumberstatusindicator.htm) web page on 18/11/2021.
